text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Trump flubbed for weeks and weeks on testing and now we have the highest death rates in the world. He uses the emergency relief funding as his campaign’s personal piggy bank and invites violence to his ignorant base. https://t.co/wAwNK5Xqq5
